title: Kepp getting failed to connect
body: My game usually runs fine but right now i keep getting a failed to connect to the game im trying to load into? Is this new or is there a quick way to solve it?

replies.body:
When you keep getting the failed the connect message, it's a good sign that there's something going on between your network's connection to our servers. Without having much more context, it's hard to pinpoint the root of the problem. Let's cover all our bases by going over all the steps in our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). 

Let me know if this helps!
I fixed it by restarting my pc, even haste didn't recognize me launching league so i figured the problem was more than just my network.
